name: About A One Night
description:
Game on gamejam Ryan Laley Games Spring Jam made in 48 hours.

In this game you must activate all switches on a map and connect with friend to escape

-------------------------------------------

Controls:

AD - move

Space - jump

LBM - shoot

-------------------------------------------

Creators:

Programmer - Lorsa (me)

Artist - XarandiiFox

-------------------------------------------

Hope you enjoy!
